name: df-qus
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cqus, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, co(cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cec(cv(s2), cv(s1))), cimas, cv(s0))))
comment: Define a quotient ring (or quotient group), which is a special case of an image structure ~ df-imas where the image function is ` x |-> [ x ] e ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
